org.mmbase.storage.search.legacy

Class DBLogicalOperator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mmbase.storage.search.legacy.ParseItem
      • org.mmbase.storage.search.legacy.DBLogicalOperator

  • class DBLogicalOperator
extends ParseItem
    Class for conversion of operators to their SQL equivalent. This class converts:
    '+' to 'AND'
    '-' to 'AND NOT'
    '|' to 'OR'
